articles.title: Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Poised to Revolutionize Android Flagship Performance
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Qualcomm launched the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor, the latest iteration of their high-end Snapdragon 8 series. The new chip features a custom Oryon CPU core, an enhanced Adreno 840 GPU, and a 3nm fabrication process, promising improved performance and power efficiency. The Xiaomi 17 series is expected to be among the first devices to integrate this new processor.

articles.title: Razzl Brand Ignites South-East Market with Vibrant Launch in Aba
articles.author: Business
articles.summary: Ultimum Limited has launched its new Razzl brand in the South-East and South-South markets of Nigeria. The launch event in Aba aimed to showcase the Razzl brand to distributors, wholesalers, and retailers. Ultimum Limited is investing in local jobs and providing consumers with a soft drink brand that delivers bold flavours and exciting experiences.

articles.title: Ogilvy ANZ debuts Generative Impact to boost brand visibility and authority in the AI era
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Ogilvy ANZ has launched Generative Impact, a new service combining earned media expertise with digital experience optimisation. This service helps brands build reputation, authority, and discoverability in an AI-powered information landscape. Ogilvy PR leads the earned-led search component while Ogilvy One ensures client websites are AI-optimized.

articles.title: Microsoft's new 'PlayFab Game Saves' aims to boost cross-save compatibility between Xbox, Steam, and other platforms too
articles.author: Windows Central
articles.summary: Microsoft's PlayFab service is being developed to allow users to potentially transfer Xbox save files to platforms like Steam Deck. This functionality might require users to purchase the game on both platforms.

articles.title: Best Air Fryer Fries: Crispy & Delicious!
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: The air fryer market is expanding with new features like rotisserie, baking, and smart home integration (Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant). Some brands such as Ninja and Xiaomi are already offering app-controlled models, AI-powered recipe recommendations are also on the rise. Restaurants are increasingly adopting air frying technology.

articles.title: Aggarwal aspired to rival Amazon, Google, OpenAI; now he must ensure Krutrim's survival
articles.summary: Krutrim, an AI venture, faces challenges with product maturation. The company once planned to use Nvidia's H100 GPUs and Blackwell B200s to power its services. Krutrim experiences issues like products that don't excite customers and funding concerns.

articles.title: Westminster City Council launches ‘Westminster Living'
articles.summary: Westminster CC launched Westminster Living, a new brand, to showcase homes for sale across its developments. This initiative supports the delivery of 4,000 new homes.

articles.title: Exploring MCP Implementation Strategies in a CRM Company
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: HubSpot integrated the Model Context Protocol (MCP) into its CRM platform. This integration has reshaped workflows by automating tasks and freeing employees for strategic initiatives. HubSpot also ensures ethical and transparent AI deployment.

articles.title: Microsoft's new Xbox mode on Windows has leaked for any handheld
articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.summary: Microsoft is preparing to launch its Xbox full-screen experience next month, accessible via a Windows 11 update. This new mode optimizes memory usage and provides direct access to the Xbox PC app, enhancing the gaming experience on devices like Asus' ROG Ally. Users can still switch to a Windows desktop mode while using the full-screen Xbox mode.

articles.title: Here Are The 29 Things To Deal With The Body Issues You'd Rather Not Broadcast To The World
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing new products or showcasing products that have gained recent popularity. These include solutions for fungal nail renewal, antiperspirant wipes, dry shampoo, callus removal, pimple treatment, cold sore healing, teeth whitening, flossing toothbrushes, butt acne clearing lotion, wart removal, dark spot removal, keratosis pilaris treatment, anti-dandruff shampoo, shoe deodorizers, ear cleaning, hand cream for excessive sweating, scar reduction, ingrown hair prevention, oral rinse, tongue scraper, bra liners, piercing bump solution, root concealing sprays/powders, foot peel masks, razor bump prevention, neck and chest firming cream, and a blackhead spatula. Many of these products are highlighted due to their effectiveness or unique approach to personal care.

articles.title: Google's experimental Windows app is better than Microsoft's built-in search
articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.summary: Google launched a new desktop app for Windows, allowing users to search the web, Google Drive, and local files. The company emphasizes that this new Google app is currently experimental.

articles.title: Your AI strategy won't matter if trust isn't on the table
articles.author: SAT Articles
articles.summary: Webfluential connects businesses with influencers, leveraging AI to generate measurable results. VW Golf GTI campaign successfully increased LLM notices to the brand. The company emphasizes the need to balance AI and human interaction in marketing, advocating for real human influence to build trust.

articles.title: Shake things up with 20% off the Ninja Nutri-Blender ahead of Prime Day
articles.author: P.J. McCormick
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a 20% discount on the Ninja Nutri-Blender Pro Personal Blender. The blender is a 1100-watt personal blender designed for crushing ice, blending fruits, and extracting nutrients, featuring Auto-iQ technology and to-go cups.

articles.title: Sparky Flinstone Announces ‘Alien Invasion' Initiative in New York City
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Sparky Flinstone is launching "Alien Invasion," an intergalactic encounter debuting in New York City in Fall 2025. The AI Experience is designed to give audiences an innovative way to explore identity, creativity, and imagination, inviting them to embrace their 'inner alien'.

articles.title: Renault Duster ute revealed with a tiny tray
articles.author: Derek Fung
articles.summary: Dacia introduced a new Duster Pickup. The product is described as not as practical as might be expected.

articles.title: SHYNE's Canadian-Made Mushroom Coffee Grows 150% YoY as Nature Lion Opens National Hub
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: SHYNE has launched MushroomCoffeeCanada.ca, an online hub for Canadian coffee drinkers, to promote their mushroom coffee products. Their signature product, Lion's Mane Coffee, is available in over 70 retail locations and is made using organic instant coffee, cashew milk powder, Canadian maple sugar, and lion's mane extract. They are also developing matcha- and cacao-based drinks for early 2026.

articles.title: How to clean winter coats and jackets, according to experts
articles.author: Cory Fernandez
articles.summary: The article highlights several cleaning products suitable for winter coats and jackets. Lysol's Free & Clear laundry sanitizing detergent, Earth Breeze laundry detergent sheets, Downy Rinse & Refresh fabric rinses, and Tide Antibacterial Fabric Spray are mentioned as solutions to clean coats without ruining the texture, and get rid of odors.

articles.title: Anker Innovation unveils next-generation products powered by advanced AI, robotics and ultimate innovation
articles.summary: Anker Innovations has announced a range of new products across its brands, including eufyMake's AI-powered design tools and UV Printer E1, Eufy's Robot Vacuum Omni S2 and Marswalker stair-climbing carrier, Eufy Security's AI Core and eufyCam S4, Soundcore's Sleep A30 earbuds and AI Voice Recorder, Anker's Prime Series multi-device charging solutions with smart displays, and Anker SOLIX Solarbank Multisystem for home energy. Soundcore also introduced the new Soundcore Nebula X1 Pro mobile theater station, featuring Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos.

articles.title: Zeta Announces Generative Engine Optimization Solution to Help Brands Lead in the Post-Search Era
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Zeta Global launched its Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) solution, a new capability within the Zeta Marketing Platform (ZMP). This tool helps brands maintain visibility and accuracy in AI-generated answers across systems like ChatGPT, Gemini, and Claude, offering targeted optimization recommendations. The GEO solution will be available in the Zeta Marketing Platform in the coming weeks.

articles.title: BoostYourCampaign Crowdfunding MVP Program helps founders launch and validate SaaS products in just 6 weeks
articles.summary: BoostYourCampaign has launched its MVP Program, a service designed to help founders quickly develop and launch software products. The MVP Program offers two packages: Clickable Prototype and MVP, with features including product-vision workshops, wireframes, competitor analysis, and market analysis. The program aims to help founders validate their concepts, pitch investors, or launch a beta within weeks.

articles.title: Meta Connect 2025 live updates: Ray-Bans 3, Hypernova smart glasses, Oakley, more
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Meta is expected to unveil its first display-enabled smart glasses. The company also plans to refresh its Ray-Ban lineup at an upcoming event.

articles.title: Gwyneth Paltrow Is Doubling Down on $725 Sweaters
articles.author: Rory Satran
articles.summary: Gwyneth Paltrow, founder of Goop, introduced her new fashion line Gwyn. The launch was held in a Goop-styled apartment in New York. Paltrow promotes the fashion line, despite personal reservations, by showcasing its clothing in content for Goop.

articles.title: Karlín's Robot-Driven Pilot Food Delivery Program Launches on Thámova Street
articles.summary: A pilot program utilizing autonomous robots for food delivery launched in Karlín, Prague on September 17th, 2025. Five restaurants along Thámova Street are participating, with customers placing orders through existing online platforms and tracking the robots in real-time. The program aims to streamline delivery, reduce times, and provide a more sustainable choice.

articles.title: monday.com Expands AI-Powered Agents, CRM Suite, and Enterprise-Grade Capabilities
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: monday.com has introduced monday campaigns, an AI-powered product for its CRM suite, and announced the full availability of monday magic, monday vibe, and monday sidekick as new AI capabilities. These announcements were made at their annual customer conference, Elevate, and aim to enhance the company's enterprise-ready platform.

articles.title: monday.com Expands AI-Powered Agents, CRM Suite, and Enterprise-Grade Capabilities
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: monday.com announced new product innovations at its annual customer conference, Elevate. These include the introduction of monday agents, the full availability of AI capabilities like monday magic, monday vibe, and monday sidekick, and the launch of monday campaigns, an AI-powered product within the monday CRM suite.

articles.title: Mr Kipling launches new festive treat based on classic Christmas must-have for the first time
articles.author: Amelia Morgan
articles.summary: Mr Kipling has launched new festive treats, including Mince Pie Whirls filled with brandy-flavored creme and mincemeat flavour sauce, available in packs of six for £1.50. Additionally, they're releasing a two-pack of Signature Collection All Butter Mince Pies and Cherry Bakewell Mini Cake Bites in tubs, along with other flavors like Caramel Crispy and Strawberry Bliss, catering to different preferences and smaller households.

articles.title: New, Improved, High-Tech Genie Car Wash Reopens in the Midway District
articles.author: Dave Schwab
articles.summary: Genie Car Wash in Point Loma has reopened after extensive remodeling, featuring a high-tech automatic car wash tunnel that can wash around 150 cars per hour. Genie Car Wash is offering unlimited washes for 99 cents for the first 30 days for new members, with packages starting from $19.99 to $29.99, providing customers a quick wash in under three minutes.

articles.title: Lather, rinse, save: CeraVe's Foaming Cleanser is on a pre-Prime Day deal
articles.author: Victoria McDonnell
articles.summary: CeraVe's Foaming Facial Cleanser is currently offered at a 31% discount on Amazon ahead of Prime Day. The cleanser is formulated with ceramides, hyaluronic acid, and niacinamide to cleanse, hydrate, and soothe the skin, making it an ideal option for normal to oily skin types.

articles.title: Car Review: Restyled Murano connects the dots
articles.summary: Nissan has updated the Murano, giving it a complete makeover to address lagging sales and compete with rivals like Kia Sorento, Hyundai Santa Fe, and Chevy Blazer. This overhaul is the first major change since the Murano's debut in 2003.

articles.title: Aldi tells shoppers 'run don't walk' as popular new item hits shelves
articles.author: Emily Parker
articles.summary: Aldi has announced the return of their Kiwi Berries in stores, urging shoppers to "run, don't walk" to grab them. The Kiwi Berries are described as grape-like berries that taste like kiwi and can be eaten in one bite, retailing for £1.99.

articles.title: Zoom unveils AI Companion 3.0 at Zoomtopia 2025, enhancing agentic AI across the Zoom platform
articles.summary: Zoom Communications introduced AI Companion 3.0, featuring agentic AI innovations across Zoom Workplace and Zoom Business Services. The announcement was made at Zoomtopia 2025. The update showcases Zoom's vision for agentic AI-first capabilities.

articles.title: Zoom unveils AI Companion 3.0 at Zoomtopia 2025, enhancing agentic AI across the Zoom platform
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Zoom Communications, Inc. has launched AI Companion 3.0, featuring agentic AI innovations across Zoom Workplace. Additionally, Zoom Business Services will introduce agentic AI features for Customer Experience and Zoom Virtual Agent to redefine customer and employee interactions. These introductions were announced at Zoomtopia 2025.

articles.title: You can chat with Copilot in Firefox now - and Windows users get an extra perk
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Firefox released its latest version. This new version aims to attract new or returning users.

articles.title: Target expands next-day delivery to more cities. Here's where.
articles.author: USA TODAY
articles.summary: Target is expanding its next-day delivery service to 35 new metro areas by the end of October, covering 85% of its items. This service is free for orders over $35, or for Target Circle 360 members and Target Circle Card purchases, while other orders incur a $5.99 fee.

articles.title: High-Quality Product Shoot Services For Instagram & Social Media
articles.summary: DID Brains Digital Marketing Agency offers professional product photography services in Pakistan, including studio and outdoor options, optimized for e-commerce platforms like Daraz and Shopify. They provide commercial product photography expertise across various industries such as fashion, food, and beauty, helping brands create a strong visual identity.

articles.title: Webflow Unveils AI Prompt-to-Production, a New Way to Build with AI
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Webflow announced a new set of agentic solutions. These solutions include new AI capabilities, CMS updates, and collaboration tools.

articles.title: All-new BYD Tang DM-i officially unveiled
articles.summary: BYD Cars Philippines, a subsidiary of ACMobility, has launched the all-new BYD Tang DM-i, expanding its Super DM-i lineup. The BYD Tang DM-i features BYD's Super DM-i technology, combining a turbocharged onboard generator with a 21.5 kWh Blade battery, delivering a total output of 271 PS and 315 Nm of torque, and is priced within P2.1 million.

articles.title: Amazon is creating more tools to fill its site with AI ads
articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.summary: Amazon is launching a new AI chatbot that allows sellers to generate promotional materials, including static and video ads, using text prompts.  Amazon is also adding new 'agentic' capabilities to its AI-powered seller assistant, enabling it to monitor inventory, provide optimization suggestions, and scan for product safety violations.

articles.title: Alo Yoga's new fall colorway dropped and fans are saying it's not just a want, ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Alo Yoga is releasing a new shade of red, following up on last year's Burgundy Truffle release.

articles.title: First impressions of the BYD Dolphin Surf: South Africa's most affordable electric vehicle
articles.author: Willem van de Putte
articles.summary: BYD has launched the Dolphin Surf, a compact hatchback EV, in two variants: Comfort (R339,900) and Dynamic (R389,900). The Comfort model features a 30kWh battery with a 232km range, while the Dynamic model has a 38.8 kWh battery offering a 295km range.  The launch includes an 'early adopter package' offering discounts and additional features.

articles.title: Amazon's secret Renewed store deals: Save on Apple products, Ninja air fryers, Shark vacuums and more
articles.summary: Amazon Renewed offers brand name tech and kitchen appliances, including Shark vacuums, Ninja blenders, and Vitamix blenders at lower prices. These products are professionally inspected and tested and available on Amazon.

articles.title: Retailers offer discounts, incentives to speed up slow sales in runup to GST 2.0
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Companies are launching new products. They anticipate an increase in sales as a result.

articles.title: Hartleys Supermarket Unveils New Store in Lagos
articles.author: Thisday
articles.summary: Hartleys Supermarket has unveiled a new store in Lagos. This expansion signifies the introduction of their services to a new location.

articles.title: Google's new Windows search app could make finding files, images and answers way quicker
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Google is testing a new Windows app called the Google app for Windows, designed to provide a Spotlight-like search experience on Windows 10 and newer machines. The app integrates Google Lens and AI-powered search capabilities. It is currently available to a small group of users in the US through Search Labs.

articles.title: Popular chicken wing chain opens 4 new N.J. restaurants. See locations.
articles.author: N.J. News Report
articles.summary: Wingstop has recently opened four new restaurant locations in New Jersey, including stores in Marlton, Voorhees, Princeton, and Middle Township. These openings bring Wingstop's total number of locations in the state to over 50. The restaurants specialize in cooked-to-order wings, boneless wings, and crispy tenders.

articles.title: Urban Valet launches laundry subscription service, and other retail stories
articles.author: The Buffalo News
articles.summary: Urban Valet's new service structure for wash-and-fold customers allows them to potentially save up to $131 monthly. This represents a change in the pricing or features of their wash and fold service.

articles.title: ‘Not Prepared For Maintenance Costs': Aston Martin Launches Rs 2.98 Lakh Baby Stroller
articles.author: Buzz Staff
articles.summary: Aston Martin, in collaboration with egg, has launched the Aston Martin egg3, a luxury baby stroller.  The stroller, inspired by Aston Martin car seats, features premium features and will be available for pre-order in the fourth quarter of 2025, starting at £2,500.

articles.title: Early Prime Day deals: Save big on must-have gadgets, power tools, camping gear
articles.author: Sarah Connor
articles.summary: Amazon's Prime Big Deal Days offer significant discounts on highly-rated products.

articles.title: Amazon device heats room 'way cheaper than having radiators on' and it's £40 off
articles.author: Lucy Addicott
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a 53% discount on the Neo Portable Dehumidifier, pricing the 1.5-liter option at £37.99. The dehumidifier is designed to extract moisture from the air, potentially increasing room temperature and helping with drying laundry indoors and reducing condensation and is compared to products from Robert Dyas, B&Q, Pro Breeze and Dunelm.

articles.title: Newsweek New & Noteworthy: Products You Need to Try (Sep 17, 2025)
articles.author: Adam Mills
articles.summary: Eggo introduced Protein Buttermilk Vanilla Waffles, featuring increased protein content. Shark launched StainForce, a cordless portable cleaner. Gain released Tango Scent Boosters, laundry beads available in Piña + Plumeria and Strawberry + Shea scents. Blue Bunny launched Candy Bar Scoopable, a new ice cream flavor. Breathe Right launched Menthol Scented Extra Strength Tan Nasal Strips. Swiffer introduced Sweep and Mop Deluxe, a 2-in-1 cleaning kit. L'oreal introduced Age Perfect Serum Le Duo, a 2-in-1 anti-aging serum. Bulletproof launched High Protein Iced Coffee. A-Sha launched Spicy Mala Meteor Noodles and Garlic Soy Thin Street Noodles. Farmina launched N&D Dental & Functional Dog Treats.

articles.title: ALDI Of Prince Frederick Is Open And Ready For Customers
articles.author: Carrie Cabral
org: Calvert County Department of Economic Development
articles.summary: ALDI has opened a new store in Prince Frederick at Armory Square, marking its first location in Calvert County. The store offers everyday low prices, quality groceries, fresh produce, and household essentials.

articles.title: White Castle's 'Surprisingly Practical' New Collab Is for Life's 'Messy' Moments
articles.author: Marisa Losciale
articles.summary: White Castle has collaborated with OxiClean to launch the limited-edition "Craver's Cleanup Kit", which includes a co-branded lapkin and OxiClean MaxForce Spray. This kit is available with the purchase of White Castle's new BBQ Pulled Pork Slider at participating drive-thru locations in select cities and online with a minimum purchase at HouseofCrave.com.

articles.title: Young Innovations Announces Distribution Partnership with OrthoNu® to Expand Its Specialty ...
articles.author: Young Innovations
articles.summary: Young Innovations, Inc. has formed a strategic partnership with OrthoNu, an orthodontic self-care solutions innovator. Young Specialties, a division of Young, will distribute OrthoNu's professional-grade, at-home orthodontic solutions nationwide.

articles.title: H-E-B superfan lines up at 2 a.m. for $30M store's grand opening
articles.author: Kelsey Thompson
articles.summary: H-E-B opened its third store in Georgetown on Wednesday, September 17. The 112,000-square-foot store features a fuel station, car wash, curbside pickup, a drive-thru pharmacy, full-service bakery and deli sections, a wine and beer department, a Blooms floral area, and a Texas Backyards section.

articles.title: Jeddah airport opens expanded duty-free with global, local brands
articles.author: Mohammed Al-Kinani
articles.summary: JAH Arabia International Duty-Free LLC has launched a new duty-free zone at Jeddah airport's Terminal 1 and North Terminal, featuring over 335 international brands across 35 outlets. This initiative aims to modernize the aviation sector, enhance passenger experience, and diversify revenue streams by showcasing global and local brands.

articles.title: Another Patent Granted: Patent Services USA Celebrates Success for Dual Phone Case Invention
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Patent Services USA announces the successful patent issuance for the Dual Phone Case, invented by Mr. Carter. The Dual Phone Case is designed to allow users carry and protect two smartphones in one compact accessory. Patent Services USA offers affordable patent services to first-time inventors, entrepreneurs, and working-class creators.

articles.title: Amazon Debuts AI ‘Creative Partner' to Aid with Campaign Development
articles.author: marketingdive.com
articles.summary: Amazon has launched a chatbot-style assistant designed to help advertisers use AI for ad creation. This new service enables ads to run across Amazon's ad inventory and partner platforms. The aim is to simplify advertising, particularly for small businesses and consumer goods companies.

articles.title: Samsung fans rush for Apple iPad rival as price drops by more than 40% on Amazon
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Samsung Galaxy Tab A9+ at a discounted price of £122.99. The tablet features 64GB storage, front and rear-facing cameras, a 5,100mAh battery, and a 60Hz refresh rate screen. Shoppers have generally reviewed the tablet positively, citing its cost-effectiveness and suitability for media consumption and everyday use.

articles.title: Is Redmi A3 Worth It? Specs, Features & Price in Nigeria
articles.summary: The Redmi A3, a budget-friendly smartphone from Xiaomi, features a premium design, a 6.71-inch display, and a 5000mAh battery.  The phone is priced starting from ₦120,000 in Nigeria. The Redmi A3 includes Android 14 Go Edition.

articles.title: One Click SEO Launches "One Click GEO" to Revolutionize Business Visibility in AI-Powered Search
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: One Click SEO has launched One Click GEO, a new service designed to help businesses adapt to AI-powered search. This service aims to improve brand visibility in AI-generated answers and dominate local search, ensuring businesses remain prominent in the evolving digital landscape.

articles.title: Laundry's Most Iconic Scent is Back: Gain® Brings Back Fan-Favorite Fragrance in Its New Tango In-Wash Scent Boosters Line Up
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Gain, a fabric care brand, is reintroducing its Apple + Mango Tango fragrance due to high demand from its community. The fragrance is back in a new form as part of the Tango In-Wash Scent Boosters collection, promising a stronger and brighter scent.

articles.title: Laundry's Most Iconic Scent is Back: Gain® Brings Back Fan-Favorite Fragrance in Its New Tango In-Wash Scent Boosters Line Up
articles.summary: Gain is bringing back its 'Apple + Mango Tango' fragrance in a new, stronger form as part of the Tango In-Wash Scent Boosters collection. The scent boosters utilize Gain's dual-action scent technology to provide a fruity-fresh fragrance that lasts up to 12 weeks. Gain Tango Scent Boosters are available at major retailers nationwide and online.

articles.title: ASUS redefines sovereign AI at inaugural ASUS AI Tech Summit in Dubai
articles.author: Tahawultech
articles.summary: ASUS unveiled its Professional Services for Sovereign AI Solutions at the ASUS AI Tech event in Dubai. This announcement solidifies ASUS's position as a global leader.

articles.title: These 30 Products Have Impressive Results…Which Is Even More Impressive When You See How Things Started
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: E.l.f. introduces a full-coverage color corrector infused with hyaluronic acid designed to conceal various skin imperfections. Dr. Scholl's launches a heel repair balm in a roll-on formula for softening and protecting cracked heels. Bissell offers the Little Green machine, a portable upholstery and carpet cleaner for tackling stains. O'Keeffe's releases a hand cream to replenish moisture in dry hands by forming a protective layer.

articles.title: Lush has launched a 90s-themed shower gel and it'll make you feel nostalgic
articles.author: Danielle Kate Wroe
articles.summary: Lush has launched a new shower gel called 'Alien Egg Farm'. The product is 90s-themed and inspired by alien egg toys.

articles.title: Inception expands global reach with AI-native offerings on Microsoft's Azure Marketplace
articles.author: Khaleej Times Staff
articles.summary: Inception, a G42 company, has made seven of its AI-powered products available on the Microsoft Azure Marketplace. These products include InExecEdge, InGenius, InAlpha, InBusiness Procurement, InBusiness Process, InBusiness Productivity and InBusiness Customer Experience designed to improve business processes and decision-making using AI. This availability signifies a strategic partnership with Microsoft to facilitate enterprise-grade AI integration at scale.

articles.title: HBO Max vs. HBO Go vs. HBO Now: The key differences explained
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: WarnerMedia launched HBO Max in May 2020 as a deluxe streaming service replacing HBO Go and HBO Now. HBO Max offers more shows and movies beyond HBO's usual cable library for $15 per month. Warner Bros. plans to release all of its upcoming movies on HBO Max the same day they hit theaters, starting with "Wonder Woman 1984" on December 25.

articles.title: Prep for Prime Big Deal Days with the most popular early tech deals
articles.author: Rachel Cortez
articles.summary: Amazon is hosting its Prime Big Deal Days sale on October 7th and 8th, offering discounts on various tech products. Deals are available on items like Soundcore by Anker headphones, Beats Studio Buds +, Apple iPad Mini A17 Pro, Samsung monitors and tablets, Lenovo laptops, Arlo security cameras, Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K, Hisense and TCL TVs, and the upcoming Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Phone.

articles.title: Hlumelo Nyaluza seeks support after losing millions from luxury bag pricing error
articles.author: Lutho Pasiya
articles.summary: Hlumelo Nyaluza launched HN Luxury bags, an African luxury bag brand featuring fine art and African craftsmanship, and custom-made car carpets. The bags were officially released around March this year and were marketed internationally. The launch of the carpets serves to raise funds for the recovery and global expansion of the brand.

articles.title: New organic soap range that's set to have Brontë fans in a lather
articles.author: Telegraph
articles.summary: A new line of organic soaps is being introduced, targeting Brontë fans. The soaps are intended to appeal to enthusiasts of the Brontë sisters' works.

articles.title: Google just solved Windows 11's biggest headache in one move
articles.author: Amir Bohlooli
articles.summary: Google released a standalone Google app for Windows as part of its AI experiments. The app functions as both a local and online search hub and includes Google Lens. The app is designed to be lightweight and accessible and serves as an alternative to Windows File Explorer and the Start menu search.

articles.title: Fan-favourite chicken foldover returns as McDonald's marks 30 years
articles.author: AKANI CHAUKE
articles.summary: McDonald's South Africa has launched a nationwide campaign for the return of its popular Chicken Foldover. This campaign celebrates both the product's enduring appeal and the brand's 30th year in the South African market. The Chicken Foldover, featuring grilled chicken patties and fresh salad wrapped in flatbread, is available at McDonald's restaurants nationwide.

articles.title: Forget your tumble dryer, B&M's £1.50 gadget is a genius way to dry clothes indoors this winter
articles.author: Celine Marshall
articles.summary: B&M is selling the 'Folding Drying Rack Multi-Use Clothes Airer' for £1.50, offering a versatile solution for indoor clothes drying. It can be used over the bath or standing against the wall and easily folded for storage. Aldi has also introduced its 'Dryer for Heating or Balcony' in UK stores for £4.

articles.title: Turning Order-To-Cash Into A Product: A PLM-First Strategy For Telcos
articles.author: Ranganath Taware
articles.summary: Capgemini suggests that telecom companies treat Order-to-Cash (O2C) as a real product with its own roadmap, modular catalogs, and defined ownership, for improving efficiency and revenue integrity. Telecom companies can adopt a product life cycle management (PLM) approach with AI to automate processes and prevent issues such as missing charges and conflicting discounts.

articles.title: Meet The 16-Year-Old Behind Hand 2 Hand – An App A Social Start-Up
articles.summary: Fahaam Ullah, a 16-year-old innovator, has launched the Hand 2 Hand app, available on the Google Play Store. This app allows users to buy and sell pre-loved products and donate items to underprivileged individuals, addressing both affordability and social good.

articles.title: Babybel unveils spicy vegan version with Stranger Things
articles.author: Grace Duncan
articles.summary: Bel UK has launched Babybel Hellfire, a limited-edition, spicy, plant-based snack, to celebrate the final season of Stranger Things. It is currently available in Sainsbury's and will be available in Morrisons later this month. The launch is supported by a social, media, and PR strategy and on-pack partnership.

articles.title: Google will let you try on AR makeup on Search
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: Google launched a new augmented reality feature on Search. This feature is designed for holiday shoppers purchasing lipsticks and eyeshadow. Google partnered with ModiFace and Perfect Corp for the AR technology.

articles.title: Skyline CEO talks launch of chicken chili, plans for expansion
articles.author: Christian Le Duc
articles.summary: Skyline Chili is launching its first major new product in decades. The CEO is also planning to expand the brand into new markets.

articles.title: 23 Beauty Products Reviewers Over 50 Wished They'd Known About Sooner
articles.author: Danielle Healy
articles.summary: L'Oréal launched a silicone-free moisturizing treatment for visibly healthier-looking hair in eight seconds. Juno & Co. introduces a gentle cleansing balm which removes mascara. Also, there is a vegan nail-strengthening polish available.

articles.title: Robot vacuum discount Amazon
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Dreame is offering the D9 Max Gen 2 robot vacuum for £149, reduced from £199. The vacuum features 6,000 Pa of suction, a 570 ml dust box, and a 235 ml water tank for mopping.  It maps homes, avoids obstacles, and can be scheduled for automated cleaning.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics Delivers Personalized, AI-Powered Screens To Enrich Everyday Life Through Samsung Vision AI
articles.summary: Samsung has launched Samsung Vision AI across its widest lineup yet, including Neo QLED, OLED, QLED, and The Frame TVs.  The new Neo QLED 8K TV, powered by the NQ8 AI Gen3 Processor, delivers enhanced picture quality and sound. The 2025 TV range is available for purchase, with the QLED starting price of Rs.374,999.

articles.title: Outbound prospecting guide for sales professionals
articles.author: Nick Gallinelli
articles.summary: Apollo.io offers a sales intelligence platform designed to enhance outbound prospecting. The platform provides an expansive database with advanced filters, engagement tools, automated features like job change alerts and buying intent data, and seamless integrations to optimize workflow.

articles.title: Universal Ads Launches AI-Powered Video Generator to Bring Free TV Commercial Ad Creation
articles.summary: Universal Ads launched a new in-platform ad creation tool that uses generative AI to enable advertisers to build commercials quickly. The tool was developed in partnership with Creatify, an AI platform. This new tool aims to reduce the time, cost, and complexity of TV ad production.

articles.title: Dyson Unveils Revamped V8 Cyclone: 60-Minute Autonomy Sets New Standard in the Vacuum Industry
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the revamped V8 Cyclone cordless vacuum cleaner, featuring an upgraded battery that provides a 60-minute runtime. This improvement is achieved through a new Nickel-Cobalt-Aluminum cathode chemistry, optimized motor efficiency, and clever power management. The new Dyson V8 Cyclone is now available through Dyson's website and authorized retailers.

articles.title: Novel Babio Baby Products Bring Gentle Care and Unbeatable Discounts to Meesho MEGA BLOCKBUSTER SALE
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Novel Tissues Pvt Ltd's Novel Babio Baby Wipes are available at discounts of up to 75% during Meesho's Mega Blockbuster Sale starting September 19th. The wipes are hypoallergenic, made with aloe vera and chamomile, pH balanced, and dermatologically tested.

articles.title: New Zealand Rural Trade Startup 2025: Revenue Jumps Two Hundred Per Cent
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Dazzly, a website builder software launched by Lewis Anderson and Marcus Feeney, empowers rural service-based businesses to create websites easily. The software provides pre-made layouts, text suggestions, and AI input, enabling businesses to quickly establish an online presence and attract new customers. Dazzly operates from Auckland, New Zealand, and serves customers in New Zealand, Australia, and the USA.

articles.title: Bosch sparks conversation on India's drying woes with ‘No Strings Attached' campaign
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: BSH Home Appliances (Bosch Group) launched a marketing initiative 'No Strings Attached' to promote Bosch dryers in India. The campaign uses humor and collaborations with comedians and meme pages to showcase the benefits of Bosch dryers as a convenient and hygienic solution for drying clothes.

articles.title: Top Tools to Create Stunning Websites
articles.author: Bhumish Sheth
articles.summary: The digital landscape is transforming with the introduction of AI-driven website builders, allowing users to launch professional websites without coding. Companies like Wix, Squarespace, Hostinger, Shopify, GoDaddy, Butternut AI and Dora AI, offer platforms that use AI to streamline website creation, content generation, SEO optimization, and customization. These AI Website Builders offer features like AI site creation, image editing, SEO guidance and content generation at different price points.

articles.title: Big Billion Moto Rush: Top Motorola smartphones under â¹15K â moto g96 5G, moto g86 Power, moto g85 5G & moto g45 5G
articles.author: SPOTLIGHT
articles.summary: Motorola has launched four new smartphones: moto g96 5G, moto g86 Power, moto g85 5G and moto g45 5G. Each phone offers specific features catering to different user needs and budgets, with prices ranging from approximately ₹10,999 to ₹16,999 during the BBD Moto Rush festive offer. All of these smartphones bring flagship-level experiences at accessible prices.

articles.title: Vietnam's Strategic Tech Products for 2025
articles.author: Vietnam Economic Times
org: Central Steering Committee on the Development of Science, Technology, Innovation, and Digital Transformation
articles.summary: Vietnam is prioritizing the deployment of strategic technology products in 2025, including large Vietnamese language models and virtual assistants, AI-powered edge-processing cameras, autonomous mobile robots, 5G mobile network systems and devices, and blockchain platforms. The Ministry of Science and Technology will evaluate these products based on technology mastery, patent ownership, market demand, and readiness for upgrades.

articles.title: NZ Startup Sees Large Growth in Rural Trade Businesses  Sep. 17, 2025 07:31
articles.summary: Dazzly, a website builder software founded by Lewis Anderson and Marcus Feeney, experienced over 100% growth in rural service-based customers in 2025. The Dazzly Website Builder simplifies website creation without requiring coding skills, offering pre-made layouts and AI assistance. Dazzly empowers businesses to quickly establish an online presence and attract more customers.

articles.title: Google Experiments With Spotlight-Style Search App for Windows Users
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Google has launched the Google app for Windows, a new desktop application designed to transform how Windows users search for information. Currently limited to a small group of users in the United States through the Search Labs program, the app offers quick access to local files, installed apps, Google Drive, and web content in one unified interface, including features like Google Lens integration and AI-powered search.

articles.title: Bucharest Exchange-listed tech company Allview launches AI-powered washing machines
articles.author: Romania Insider
articles.summary: Visual Fan announced the launch of a new brand of washing machines powered by artificial intelligence on the Romanian market. This expansion into home appliances is part of their long-term strategy to build a diversified portfolio based on innovation, AI, and functional design.

articles.title: 盒马终于要来如皋啦！_手机网易网
articles.summary: Hema is launching a new store format called '盒马NB' (Hema Neighbor Business) in Rugao. This new format emphasizes providing affordable and reliable products and services to the local community.

articles.title: Adams Idea Tech V3 video
articles.author: Golf
articles.summary: Adams is showcasing its new Idea Tech V3 hybrid golf club.

articles.title: Microsoft Surface Duo: All you need to know about the new Surface Phone
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Microsoft introduced the Surface Duo, a phone-tablet hybrid, also referred to as a Surface Phone.

articles.title: AnyMind Group launches AnyLive for Creators, enabling content creators to generate their own AI avatars
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: AnyMind Group launched AnyLive for Creators, a platform enabling influencers to generate AI avatars for live commerce. These AI avatars can host livestreams 24/7 on platforms like YouTube and TikTok, delivering content in eight languages. This allows creators to generate income through affiliate campaigns and frees up their time for content creation.

articles.title: New colors for the Galaxy S21 revealed in leaked renders
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Leaked renders reveal new color options for the Galaxy S21. The new colors suggest a refresh of the product line.

articles.title: Lavazza's smart new coffee machine automatically adjusts its settings to suit your beans – and it looks stunning too
articles.author: Cat Ellis
articles.summary: Lavazza has launched the Lavazza Assoluta, a new automatic espresso machine designed to optimize flavor based on selected coffee beans. Users can select Lavazza's blends through the Piacere Lavazza mobile app. The machine is available for purchase directly from Lavazza, with a subscription discount.

articles.title: Laundry Basket: Stylish Storage for Mess-Free Living
articles.summary: Various laundry baskets are being offered with unique designs and functionality. These include woven multicolor bins, neutral jute style bins with 63L capacity, spacious freestanding bins, compact foldable baskets, large lidded bins, and plastic knit style bins, all available for purchase.

articles.title: Sobot AI Revolutionizes Customer Contact with Advanced AI Integration
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Sobot has introduced advancements in its updated Sobot AI, which has achieved an average response accuracy rate exceeding 90% and a resolution rate of 88% based on customer trials. This latest version combines Generative AI with Multi-Faceted AI incorporating retrieval-augmented generation, large language models, and Small Language Models.

articles.title: American rapper Cardi B launches new series Cardi Tries online
articles.author: Naij
articles.summary: Cardi B launched a new series titled 'Cardi Tries' on December 17. The series features Cardi B trying activities she has never done before.

articles.title: Google is testing a new search app on Windows that lets you find files, images and answers fast
articles.summary: Google launched the Google app for Windows under its Search Labs program. The new application allows users to search across devices, local files, and the web. It integrates Google Lens and an AI Mode for conversational responses.

articles.title: 30 Best Walmart Cleaning Products For Your Home
articles.author: Brock Pirtle
articles.summary: The article highlights a variety of cleaning products, including Swiffer mop kits, air purifiers, robot vacuums, The Pink Stuff's Miracle multipurpose cleaner, Scrubbing Bubbles toilet cleaning stamps, Scotch-Brite shower and tub scrubbers, cooktop cleaner kits, Wet and Forget shower spray, Glisten garbage disposer foaming cleaner, O-Cedar spin mops, Mr. Clean Magic Erasers, Dawn Powerwash, car upholstery cleaner, odor-eliminating spray, Swiffer dusting kits, stainless-steel wipes, Little Green upholstery cleaner, rubber squeegee brush, fume-free oven cleaner spray, pumice stone bars, ChomChom pet hair remover roller, cleaning K-Cups, Folex Instant Carpet Stain Remover, Clorox drain snakes, grout cleaner, cleaning gel, Shark steam mop, handheld squeegee, Green Gobbler drain cleaner, and foaming glass cleaner. These products are designed to simplify and enhance cleaning tasks around the house and in the car, addressing a range of needs from surface cleaning to odor elimination and appliance maintenance.

articles.title: Ooredoo Kuwait to Launch iPhone 17 in Major Event at Headquarters
articles.summary: Ooredoo Kuwait is preparing to launch the iPhone 17 at an event on September 19th at the Ooredoo Tower. The launch will showcase the device's integration with Ooredoo's 5G Advanced network, and the iPhone 17 will be available at Ooredoo Kuwait branches with sales starting at 4:00 PM on the same day.

articles.title: PVDN launches early-access Android app with customizable local news — iOS coming November 15
articles.author: Ian Hayden Parker
articles.summary: PVDN (Puerto Vallarta Daily News) launched an early-access Android app providing readers customizable local news. The initial release emphasizes fast loading, simplified login, and comfortable reading controls. An iOS version is scheduled for release on November 15.

articles.title: Ballito start-up food app turns expiring stock into savings for shoppers
articles.author: Nothando Mhlongo
articles.summary: Kensy Mkhabele, Ryan Ramsoondur, Nikeel Nundcoomar, Sagel Pillay, and Dylan Schwikkard launched "Just in Time", a food rescue platform designed to connect businesses with expiring stock to customers at reduced prices. Yoli's Bakery has already joined the platform and the service is available online and as an app.

articles.title: Here's a first look at Samsung's upcoming midrange Galaxy A72 5G
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Samsung is introducing its upcoming midrange smartphone, the Galaxy A72 5G. This provides a first look at the new product.

articles.title: 37 Affordable Products With Tons Of 5-Star Reviews
articles.author: Rachelle Yang
articles.summary: The article highlights various product launches and introductions. Good Molecules launched the Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel. Anua introduced a heartleaf pore-clearing cleansing oil. L'Oreal introduced Lumi Glotion, an illuminating moisturizer. Cosrx introduced Snail Mucin 92% Repair Cream to hydrate skin. Mielle launched a rosemary mint strengthening oil. Essence launched Lash Princess mascara and Volume Booster Lash Primer.

articles.title: I Hate To Break It To You, But You Won't Be Able To Live Without These 40 Products After Trying Them Once
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Nivea launched a lightweight gel cream enriched with Q10, improving skin firmness. Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder, a mattifying powder with blue hyaluronic acid. Clinique released Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Pink Honey, offering a buildable tint. Catrice launched "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, a tinted concealer with hyaluronic acid and shea butter. Mise En Scene released Perfect Serum, a K-beauty product for repairing brittle locks.

articles.title: Lightspeed Voice Unveils Sentiment Alerts in NOVA AI Platform
articles.author: Lightspeed Voice
articles.summary: NOVA has enhanced its AI-powered tools with Sentiment Alerts. This new feature provides businesses with actionable signals based on customer emotions, helping them identify and address potential customer dissatisfaction.

articles.title: Wyze's New Palm Lock Recognizes the Veins in Your Hand
articles.author: Tyler Graham
articles.summary: Wyze has launched the Palm Lock, a new home security product that uses hand-scanning biometric technology to unlock doors. The lock reads the unique vein patterns under the skin when a homeowner hovers their hand in front of the reader. Wyze claims this technology is faster than fingerprint scanners.

articles.title: In The Driver's Seat With Emma Lewisham, Porsche New Zealand's First Local Partner
articles.author: Porsche
articles.summary: Porsche is celebrating milestones with a partnership and the announcement of its new Macan EV. Emma Lewisham disrupted the luxury skincare market with formulations.

articles.title: Meta's New Connected Glasses: "It's a Marketing Hit," According to an Expert in Artificial Intelligence
articles.author: TVA Nouvelles
articles.summary: Meta's promotional video featuring new connected glasses has potentially leaked. The leak may be a deliberate marketing strategy to create buzz around the upcoming product.

articles.title: Google's Pixel 10: The Guardian's Review of Google's Latest Smartphone Innovation
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google has unveiled the Pixel 10 series, including the Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10a, and the Pixel 10 Fold. The Pixel 10 series features advancements in AI integration, camera technology, and the Pixel 10 Fold is Google's first IP68-rated foldable device.

articles.title: Sobot Encourages the Synergy of Generative AI & Multi-Faceted AI in Customer Contact
articles.author: PR Newswire Asia
articles.summary: Sobot has launched an updated version of its Sobot AI customer contact solution. The updated Sobot AI features improved accuracy and resolution rates, achieving over 90% average response accuracy and 88% independent resolution rate, through the synergy of Generative AI and Multi-faceted AI. The solution includes AI Agent, AI Copilot, and AI Insight components.

articles.title: 36 Viral TikTok Products That *Actually* Work
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: Several new products are being introduced, including SweatBlock antiperspirant wipes, Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream, and Dreamlux leggings. Anua pore-clearing cleansing oil and an enzyme-based laundry stain remover are also featured. Lottabody is launching a Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse, while Dae introduces a Cactus Fruit 3-In-1 Styling Cream. Other products include Catrice's 'Instant Awake' Under Eye Brightener, Clinique's Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Black Honey, Death Wish Instant Coffee Packets, and EOS Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere body lotion.

articles.title: Best Tools To Generate Your Company Logo
articles.author: Satya Prakash
articles.summary: Looka, Canva, Logo.com, Adobe Express, Brand Crowd, and Logopony offer AI-powered platforms that enable users to create professional-looking company logos quickly and easily. These platforms provide various features such as customizable templates, diverse font and color choices, and high-resolution downloads, empowering businesses to establish strong brand identities without extensive design expertise or cost.

articles.title: Sneak Peek Inside Australia's First ‘Caption by Hyatt' Hotel
articles.author: Nick Hall
articles.summary: Hyatt Hotels Corporation is launching its new lifestyle sub-brand, Caption by Hyatt, in Australia with the opening of Caption by Hyatt Central Sydney on October 13, 2025. The 174-room hotel, located on Parker Street in Sydney, offers a digital-first experience with amenities like digital check-in, a fitness center, and a mixed-use space called Talk Shop, targeting social travelers and digital nomads.

articles.title: Disney, Universal, Warner Bros. sue Chinese AI start-up MiniMax for copyright infringement
articles.author: Straits Times
articles.summary: MiniMax is marketing its Hailuo AI video service. The company positions Hailuo AI as a 'Hollywood studio in your pocket'.

articles.title: These 45 Products Might Be Boring As Drywall, But They Will Improve Your Life
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: This article introduces a variety of new products. The products featured include: Neutrogena Dry-Touch SPF 70 Sunscreen providing a matte finish and sun protection; Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream with aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil; Aquaphor's Healing Balm Stick made with avocado oil and shea butter to soothe dry, cracked skin; Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Body Mist Oil with vitamin E and jojoba oil for dry skin fix; Dr. Scholl's Roll-On Foot Pain Relief Liquid; and Blistex Medicated Lip Balm. The article also mentions an Apple-compatible locator tag that functions just like an AirTag.

articles.title: Prime Video launches fiery Gen V Season Two pop-up at Butter Sydney
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Prime Video partnered with Butter Sydney to launch a limited-edition 'Gen V' themed meal to celebrate the return of 'Gen V Season Two'. The meal, available on September 17th at Butter Sydney, includes fried chicken wings with exclusive sauces. The first 200 customers received the 'Gen V' meal for free.

articles.title: Samsung AI Future: CMO Braun on Next Steps & Vision
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is integrating AI across its product line, aiming for 400 million users of Galaxy AI by the end of 2025. Future AI developments include hyper-personalization, enhanced interoperability between devices, AI-driven sustainability, and conversational AI interfaces.

articles.title: Food Bites: Yo-Chi countdown begins, Yotam Ottolenghi at NEX
articles.author: Lisa Rockman
articles.summary: Yo-Chi is opening a new venue at Charlestown Square on October 2, offering self-serve frozen yoghurt and acai. Seven new Yo-Chi venues are scheduled to open by the end of the year, expanding from its Melbourne launch in 2012. Burger Fields is opening in Mayfield this weekend offering half-priced burgers from 5pm to 11pm.

articles.title: Sport services highlighted at 2025 CIFTIS
articles.summary: Iced Hydrogel showcased its gel-based ice at CIFTIS 2025, which maintains its form without melting at room temperature. Rigour Technology presented its ping-pong replay system, which analyzes ball trajectory and player reaction times, and their "China Hawk-Eye" system for football, snooker, tennis, and volleyball that integrates AI and 5G technologies.

articles.title: Magic Sleek Expands Hair Rescue Line with Peptide Infusion and Blonde Radiance Treatments
articles.author: Index-Journal
articles.summary: New clean hair care formulas provide instant repair, hydration, and radiance. These formulas are designed for all hair types.

articles.title: New Google app for Windows brings AI, file search, and Lens in one place
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: Google launched a new application for Windows. This app allows users to perform search functions.

articles.title: With Noble Mobile, Andrew Yang wants to do for data what Mark Cuban did for ...
articles.author: New York Post
articles.summary: Andrew Yang launched Noble Mobile, a new wireless carrier service, aiming to reduce phone bills for Americans.

articles.title: Why Feelings Matter More Than Features In Building Winning SaaS Products
articles.author: Phil Portman
articles.summary: The SaaS market is crowded and new tools launch every day. It is important to deliver an emotional value to the clients. For example, Canva made even non-designers feel like creative pros. This emotional win turned millions of users into unpaid brand ambassadors.

articles.title: Dongfeng's premium Voyah ramps up NEV launches
articles.author: Cao Yingying
articles.summary: Voyah launched its 2026 Dream MPV on September 15, 2025, which secured over 10,000 orders within 18 hours. The new Dream MPV offers plug-in hybrid and pure electric power train options, along with advanced driver-assist systems developed by Kunpeng and Huawei's Qiankun.

articles.title: Another Dragon Quest RPG has been announced, as Square Enix capitalises on renewed series success
articles.author: Eurogamer
articles.summary: A new Dragon Quest game has been revealed. The game is not Dragon Quest 7 Reimagined.

articles.title: NVIDIA's Blackwell Platform Ignites AI Revolution as Demand for Chips Soars
articles.author: The Call
articles.summary: NVIDIA is experiencing high global demand for its AI chips. The company has unveiled its Blackwell platform, a new generation of AI accelerators, which is already sold out through 2025.

articles.title: A Decade of Digital Innovation: Ready Media Group Unveils ‘100 Reasons' Campaign
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Ready Media Group is celebrating its 10th anniversary by launching a new national campaign called '100 Reasons Why We Deliver More'.

articles.title: CODI Manufacturing's Gantry Palletizers Deliver High Performance at a Low Cost
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: CODI Manufacturing introduces the new Flex Stack series of gantry palletizers at Pack Expo. These palletizers offer higher performance and lower total cost of ownership compared to cobot palletizers, while maintaining a similar price point. The Flex Stack series is designed for high-speed operations and includes real-time component monitoring for planned preventive maintenance.

articles.title: Dongfeng's premium Voyah ramps up NEV launches
articles.author: China Daily
articles.summary: Voyah, Dongfeng Motor's NEV brand, launched the 2026 Dream MPV. The new MPV secured over 10,000 orders within 18 hours of its release, indicating strong initial market demand.

articles.title: Inception expands global reach with AI-native offerings on Microsoft's Azure Marketplace
articles.author: Khaleejtimes
articles.summary: Inception, a G42 company, now offers seven of its AI-powered domain-specific products and enterprise business solutions on the Microsoft Azure Marketplace. This expands the strategic partnership between G42 and Microsoft, providing broader access to Inception's offerings.

articles.title: Amazon is creating more tools to fill its site with AI ads
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Amazon is introducing an AI chatbot for sellers that generates promotional ads from text prompts. This new tool aims to reduce the time and cost associated with designing creative ads, encouraging rapid experimentation for advertisers.

articles.title: Servify and Appalachian Wireless Partner to Deliver Device Protection Services
articles.author: KJAS
articles.summary: Servify, a device protection services company, announced new device protection services.

articles.title: Hate Windows Search? Google's new Spotlight-style app could finally be the fix you need
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Google launched a new Windows app. The app features desktop search and Google Lens functionality for PCs.

articles.title: Logitech just unveiled the Astro A20 X, a multi-platform gaming headset with a suspiciously familiar design
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Logitech introduced a new Astro headset.

articles.title: DAMN Mama: The Next Brand In Melanated Rich Beauty
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: DAMN Mama, a new Black-owned cosmetic brand, has officially launched. The brand focuses on serving the needs of brown and black women. The product can be found at www.damnmama.com.

articles.title: Differentiate or die — Why America needs a real anti-establishment movement
articles.author: The Mercury
articles.summary: InnovateCorp launched a new AI-powered marketing platform. This platform offers enhanced customer segmentation and personalized messaging. InnovateCorp aims to gain a competitive advantage through differentiation.
